name: Rhythm Game (VedesxYT)
description:
A rhythm game I decided to make :)

All songs are copyright free, and belong to their rightful owner :D

Controls:

1 = Red

2 = Blue

3 = Green

4 = Cyan

GAME IS CURRENTLY NOT WORKING

LEVELS ARE NOT PLAYING

To make an account, launch the game, and press the register button.

There, all you need to do is fill out the forms :D

Feel free to check out my channel: Vedesx - YouTube :)
